body.name: Retro Game Stick with Built-in 9 Emulators, Retro Gaming Console with 20,000+ Games, HDMI Output and 2.4GHz Wireless Controller for TV Plug and Play - Revisit Classic Games
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 13 hrs 21 mins
features: 【MASSIVE GAME LIBRARY】: The wireless classic TV Retro game console system has over 20,000+ built-in games and 9 pre-installed emulators built-in, so you can play all your favorite classic games without downloading or connecting to the Internet.downloading or connecting to the Internet.
【2.4GHz Wireless Connection】: 2.4GHz wireless game controller, you can play your favorite games from the comfort of your sofa without any wires. (AAA batteries not included in package.)
【HD HDMI Output】: Use an HDMI cable to connect the Retro Game stick to your TV, and you can enjoy high-definition retro video games on the big screen.
【Easy to operate】: Just connect the game stick to the power source, plug it into your TV, and switch to the HD channel. No complicated setup or installation required.

【Ideal Gift for All Ages】: The Nostalgic Retro Gaming Console not only provides hours of fun for kids, but also evokes fond memories of childhood for adults. This is the perfect gift for any occasion, including birthdays and holidays.
body.description: 1. Retro Gaming Reimagined: Step into a nostalgic realm of gaming with our Retro Game Stick! Meticulously designed to capture the essence of classic gaming consoles, this portable powerhouse brings a vintage touch to your modern gaming experience. Relive the glory days with a console that marries the best of the past and present. 2. Compact All-in-One Design: Experience gaming on the go with our sleek and compact Retro Game Stick. No need for bulky setups – this all-in-one console integrates everything you need, including a built-in controller. Slip it into your bag, and effortlessly carry your favorite games wherever nostalgia takes you.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 2.1 2.1 out of 5 stars 6 ratings 2.1 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I open the box very little information so what easy to understand. Hooked up to TV. All I see is a game screen controller just blink. Totally disappointed will be sending this back

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars I don’t waste your money
reviews.reviewText: Not what I expected, the controller don’t work, the games so slow. Not the right classic games

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not worth it
reviews.reviewText: Bought it because I like old school games. Most of the ones I like don't work. And when I play pokemon and save my progress it gets deleted. Very disappointing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Seemed like a cute little system and something to keep my 6 year old occupied. But though it was easy to set up the games were asking to insert coin and he still hasn’t been able to play the system.
